description: This file defines UI components for a React Native application, including buttons, cards, and headers with styling and theming.

methods.name: AppButton
methods.description: A themed button component with variants for styling and disabled state.

methods.name: Card
methods.description: A surface container component with elevation and rounded corners.

methods.name: GradientHeader
methods.description: A gradient header component with title, optional subtitle, and optional right content.
